definitions: the action or process of sailing or otherwise traveling all the way around something, especially the world

examples.text: he completed the fastest solo circumnavigation in a small vessel
the first circumnavigation of the globe in a helicopter

shortDefinitions: action or process of sailing all way around something

definitions: the action of going around or avoiding an obstacle

examples.text: our leisurely circumnavigation of the rocks

shortDefinitions: action of going around or avoiding obstacle

definitions: the action of avoiding something difficult or unpleasant

examples.text: a circumnavigation of the simple facts

shortDefinitions: action of avoiding something difficult or unpleasant
